mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract(serialNum, comId, contractNum, contractType, serviceModel, settlementClause, startDate, endDate, signDate, signer, remark, electronicContract, signContract,versionNO,status, isLatestVersion,creator,createTime,updater,updateTime,firstParty,secondParty,firstPartySigner,secondPartySigner,otherPartyContractNum,signerAddress,contractNumber) VALUES(#{id},#{comId},#{contractNum},#{contractType},#{serviceModel},#{settlementClause},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{signDate},#{signer},#{remark}, #{electronicContract},#{signContract}, '1','0', '1', #{creator},NOW(),#{creator},NOW(),#{firstParty},#{secondParty},#{firstPartySigner},#{secondPartySigner},#{otherPartyContractNum},#{signerAddress},#{contractNumber})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.serialNum AS Id, a.contractNum, a.firstParty, a.secondParty, a.contractType, a.serviceModel, a.signDate, a.signer, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.versionNO, a.status FROM contract a LEFT JOIN orderInfo b ON a.serialNum=b.contractSerial WHERE a.delFlg='0'
and b.serialNum IS NULL

SELECT a.serialNum AS id,a.contractNum,(SELECT comName FROM company WHERE comId=b.buyComId) AS comId, a.contractType,COUNT(DISTINCT b.serialNum) AS orderAmount,a.signDate,a.signer,a.startDate,a.endDate, a.versionNO,b.status FROM contract a LEFT JOIN orderInfo b ON a.serialNum=b.contractSerial WHERE a.delFlg='0' AND ((b.supplyComId IS NULL AND b.delFlg='0' and b.status !=0) or ((a.status=3 or a.status=2) and a.contractType = '采购框架'))
GROUP BY(a.serialNum)

SELECT a.serialNum AS id,a.contractNum,(SELECT comName FROM company WHERE comId=b.supplyComId) AS comId,a.contractType,COUNT(DISTINCT b.serialNum) AS orderAmount,a.signDate,a.signer,a.startDate,a.endDate, a.versionNO,b.status FROM contract a LEFT JOIN orderInfo b ON a.serialNum=b.contractSerial WHERE a.delFlg='0' AND ((b.buyComId IS NULL AND b.delFlg='0' and b.status !=0 and b.status !=66 and b.status !=77 and b.status !=1) or ((a.status=3 or a.status=2) and a.contractType = '销售框架'))
GROUP BY(a.serialNum)

SELECT a.serialNum,a.orderNum,a.orderType,a.orderAmount,COUNT(DISTINCT b.serialNum) AS materielAmount,(SELECT comName FROM company WHERE comId=a.buyComId) AS buyComId,(SELECT comName FROM company WHERE comId=a.supplyComId) AS supplyComId,a.maker,a.orderDate,a.status FROM orderInfo a LEFT JOIN orderMateriel b ON a.serialNum=b.orderSerial WHERE a.contractSerial=#{contractSerial} AND a.delFlg='0' GROUP BY (a.serialNum)
